description:
Ritsuko is a classmate of http://anidb.net/ch41399 [Kaoru] and http://anidb.net/ch41395 [Sentarou] and an old friend of the latter. This kind, always cheerful and charmingly-freckled high school freshman is also the poster girl for Welcome Records, her family`s record shop. The basement of the shop has a practice studio that serves as a hang-out for Sentarou, Kaoru, her father, and assorted jazz cronies.
Source: Official Site
name: Mukae Ritsuko
